project.description: Render the package documentation website for https://docs.ropensci.org

hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: DISABLE_AUTO_FLUSH
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: Do not automatically flush the package cache on a rebuild.

hudson.tasks.Shell.command: #!/bin/sh set -e echo "Starting pkgdown build!" echo "" git log -n1 echo "" cat DESCRIPTION BASENAME=$(basename $PWD) PACKAGE=$(grep 'Package:' DESCRIPTION | awk '{print $NF}') echo "PACKAGE NAME: $PACKAGE" echo "GIT_BRANCH: $GIT_BRANCH" if [ "$GIT_BRANCH" = "origin/master" ]; then if git log -n1 | grep "flushcache"; then echo "Flushing the cache!" docker volume rm ${BASENAME}_cache || true fi if [ "$GIT_COMMIT" = "$GIT_PREVIOUS_COMMIT" ] && [ "$DISABLE_AUTO_FLUSH" = "false" ]; then echo "Fresh rebuild: flushing the cache!" docker volume rm ${BASENAME}_cache || true fi ENABLE_CACHE="--env R_LIBS_USER=/cache -v ${BASENAME}_cache:/cache" ENABLE_STORE="-v data:/data" fi if [ -f ".Renviron" ]; then ENVVAR_FILE="--env-file=.Renviron" fi docker pull ropensci/docs ID=$(docker create --rm $ENVVAR_FILE $ENABLE_CACHE $ENABLE_STORE ropensci/docs build "/$BASENAME" "$GIT_URL") docker cp $PWD "$ID:/$BASENAME" docker start $ID --attach if [ "$GIT_BRANCH" = "origin/master" ]; then echo "Deploying to https://docs.ropensci.org..." export GIT_USER=$(git show -s --format='%an' $GIT_COMMIT) export GIT_EMAIL=$(git show -s --format='%ae' $GIT_COMMIT) export GIT_TIMESTAMP=$(git show -s --format='%at' $GIT_COMMIT) echo "Deploy user: $GIT_USER <$GIT_EMAIL>" docker run --rm -e GIT_USER -e GIT_EMAIL -e GIT_TIMESTAMP --env-file=/var/jenkins_home/ghtoken.txt -v data:/data ropensci/docs deploy $PACKAGE echo "Docs deployment done!" echo "Updating r-universe..." docker run --rm -e GIT_USER -e GIT_EMAIL -e GIT_TIMESTAMP --env-file=/var/jenkins_home/ghtoken.txt -v data:/data ropensci/docs universe $GIT_URL $PACKAGE $GIT_COMMIT echo "Done!" else echo "Skipping deployment for non-master branch" fi echo "All done!"
